mapper.insert: insert into board (board_no,sch_no, board_title, hidden, board_img, thumbImg) values (seq_board.nextval,#{schNo}, #{boardTitle},#{hidden},#{boardImg},#{thumbImg})
mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum no,a.* from (select b.board_no, b.sch_no, board_title, w_date, mod_date, pick_cnt, v_cnt, hidden, board_img, thumbImg, m.nickname from schedule s, member m,board b where s.sch_status = 'BS001' and hidden='y' and s.sch_no=b.sch_no and s.mem_no=m.mem_no order by board_no desc )a where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where no >= (#{pageNum} -1) *#{amount}+1
mapper.update: update board set hidden='y' where sch_no = #{schNo}
update board set hidden='n' where sch_no = #{schNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from board where hidden='y'
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET pick_cnt = pick_cnt +1 where sch_no = #{schNo}
UPDATE board SET pick_cnt = pick_cnt -1 where sch_no = #{schNo}
update board set v_cnt = v_cnt +1 where board_no = #{boardNo}
